# Getting started:

## Install dependencies:

```sh
$ npm i
```

## Run docker-compose for build database:

```sh
$ docker-compose up -d
```

## Run prisma migrates:

```sh
$ npx prisma migrate dev
```

## Start application:

```sh
$ npm run start:dev
```

## Open Swagger documentation:
```sh
http://localhost:port/api
```
